ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 34 songs?
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve only checked a few Bard guilds/songsellers for songs (Freeport, Erudin and FV), and only found the new level 49 one (in Erudin, I hear it s also in
ygData.messageBody:
I've only checked a few Bard guilds/songsellers for songs (Freeport, Erudin and FV), and only found the
new level 49 one (in Erudin, I hear it's also in Qeynos). The level 34 song is, I've read, a proposed
song for the new expansion. It's supposed to be a mini-Cantata type song, which I'm assuming can be woven
with level 32 for greater mana regen effect. If anyone's seen this or any other new song in game, please
spoil me.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 54 songs, Innoruuk



Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> Just got this request:
>
> "Date: Sun, 03 Dec 2000 13:48:29 -0600

> To: Talies the Wanderer
> Subject: Bard songs
> Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
> Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
>
> Hi
> Heard that there is 2 songs at lev 34, one called "Cantana of Soothing".
>
> Have you ever heard of it?
> Acyra (Nameless)"
>
> Thanks in advance - I'm clueless these days.
>
> Talies the Wanderer
> Check out the EverQuesting Bard:
> http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
>
